vlive.korean: "머리카락 색 실수인 척 보여주면 안 돼요?" "Can you show us your hair color as if it was an accident"? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 즐거운 휴닝로직🤗
vlive.english: "Can you show us your hair color as if it was an accident"?

vlive.korean: 아니 그 머리카락으로 항상 가리고... He's using his hair to cover his face... 듣기 View video GOT7 : 눈 덩어리💚
vlive.english: He's using his hair to cover his face...

vlive.korean: 애초에 머리카락이... Yes, the hair is... 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 수빈&휴닝카이 : 뚝딱뚝딱 공작시간
핑핑이가 머리카락이 있었나요? Did Gary have hair? 듣기 View video AB6IX : AB6IX (에이비식스) 추석 과일 만들기(로 시작했는데...)
머리카락만 올려도 좋다고? You like it when I have my hair up? 듣기 View video AOA : 엘비스랑수다떨고싶은데나보러와줄래?
vlive.english: You like it when I have my hair up?

examples.korean: Soft water is kinder to your hair. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 연수가 머리카락에 더 좋다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Soft water is kinder to your hair. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Her hair hung limply over her forehead. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 머리카락이 이마 위로 축 처져 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her hair hung limply over her forehead. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: My hair is very fine. Yours is much thicker. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내 머리카락은 너무 가늘어. 네 건 훨씬 더 굵어. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: My hair is very fine. Yours is much thicker. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He grabbed a handful of hair and jerked at it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 머리카락을 한 움큼 거머쥐고 홱 잡아당겼다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He grabbed a handful of hair and jerked at it. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: A tan emphasized the fairness of her hair. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 피부를 태워 놓으니까 그녀의 옅은 색 머리카락이 더 두드러졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A tan emphasized the fairness of her hair. Add to Wordbook
